3: Looks like it went underground again.
That was close... This is the first time I've seen a Corrupted like that.
Liv, can you look up information on Vassago? We'll need more effective strategies next time we encounter it.
Of course. Vassago, a bionic mechanoid of a high-level experiment project, violent in nature...
Sensors are installed all over its body, very sensitive to movement, heat, smell, and shortwave communication signals.
But its visual sensors are just average, if you want to avoid Vassago, it's recommended to set a lure.
There's nothing we can use as a lure right now, unless...
Lee, Kamui is our comrade, and we do not leave comrades behind...
